review: Unit is fast, powerful, and easy to setup.  Definitely a deal for the costCould be improved by- Allowing you to set different passwords for amazon prime content and amazon's purchased content- Making it easier to search/sort between prime content and amazons purchased content- Allow searching of content on apps (netflix, hulu, plex, etc) from the main search function (similar to googletv)- Implementing content from apps (netflix, hulu) into main screen/menu- Implementing voice commands into apps
author: Ryan Dauw

review: Coupled with my Amazon Prime account, added Netflix, this thing is awsome!  Super easy to install.  I did have to add a HDMI hub as my TV only has 2 HDMI ports.  The voice search function works surprisingly well and is also very easy to use.  I can't wait to see what they start adding for functionality.  Right now the games are a little sparse, but I'm not a big gamer anyway.
author: ddk789 "ddk"

review: I truly love this.  I can sit down and watch a movie anytime, listen to music, play a game.  The kids just think its truly wonderful.
author: KAREN

review: I always thought of buying a game console but never wanted to spend 50$ a game. Then I got this device and to my surprise it's an awesome gaming machine. I now have a collection of 40 games and the most I have spent on a game is 6.99. That was for a 3 Grand Theft Auto games a series. The box is great I used to use a Sony blue ray player for streaming but this is so much faster . This is by far one of the best home entertainment devices . Also when I take photos with my phone or kindle HDX the photos are instantly downloaded on to the fire tv so you can see your photos on tv. Amazon sent me an app for my phone. I still am surprised the box was only 100 dollars I love it.
author: michael cruson

review: I really like the way the menu is organized. The remote works very well. I'm getting good HD signal consistently with no buffering. This is what I was waiting for!

review: Way better then the Roku. I don't like the fact that you can't play videos over the USB port and that an iOS or Android based remote is not available. Other then that it's great and I love that it supports Youtube.

review: I'm very satisfied with my Amazon Fire TV; voice command works perfectly. No complaints.  Voice commands appear to be limited to Amazon App; would be nice to see this product advance to voice command movies on Netflix. I highly recommend this product.
